description: Creates a case in the specified Cases domain. Case system and custom fields are taken as an array id/value pairs with a declared data types. The following fields are required when creating a case:

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: An array of objects with field ID (matching ListFields/DescribeField) and value union data. (dict) --- Object for case field values. Unique identifier of a field. Union of potential field value types. booleanValue (boolean) --- Can be either null, or have a Boolean value type. Only one value can be provided. doubleValue (float) --- Can be either null, or have a Double number value type. emptyValue (dict) --- An empty value. stringValue (string) --- String value type. userArnValue (string) --- Represents the user that performed the audit.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: Union of potential field value types.

nested_params.name: booleanValue
nested_params.description: Can be either null, or have a Boolean value type. Only one value can be provided.

nested_params.name: doubleValue
nested_params.description: Can be either null, or have a Double number value type. Only one value can be provided.

nested_params.name: userArnValue
nested_params.description: Represents the user that performed the audit.

parameters.name: performedBy
parameters.description: Represents the entity that performed the action. customEntity (string) --- Any provided entity. userArn (string) --- Represents the Amazon Connect ARN of the user.

nested_params.name: userArn
nested_params.description: Represents the Amazon Connect ARN of the user.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: A unique identifier of a template.

nested_items.name: caseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the case.

nested_items.name: caseId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier of the case.
